## UpdateListRequest type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UpdateListRequest = {
    name?: string;
    description?: string;
    appearance?: {
        icon: string;
        hue?: number;
    };
    visualization?: 'list' | 'kanban' | 'calendar' | 'gantt' | 'conversation' | 'figma';
    archivedAt?: string;
};
```
